items.question: How anonymous is my data?
items.answer: Your data is completely anonymous. We use end-to-end encryption and never store personally identifiable information. Your entries are encrypted on your device before being sent to our servers.

items.question: Is my data private and secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. We use military-grade encryption (AES-256) to protect your data. Your information is stored securely and never shared with third parties. You can delete your account and all your data at any time.

items.question: Can I export my data?
items.answer: Yes, with a Premium subscription you can export all your data in multiple formats (JSON, PDF, CSV). This ensures you always have access to your personal information and can migrate if necessary.

items.question: What happens if I forget my password?
items.answer: You can reset your password using the "Forgot password" link on the login page. We will send you a secure reset link by email. Note that due to our encryption, we cannot recover your data if you lose access to your account.

footer.description: Your private digital intimate journal for personal growth and self-reflection.

header.title: Security & Privacy
header.subtitle: Your privacy is our absolute priority. Discover how we protect your most sensitive data with the highest industry security standards.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: Your data is encrypted on your device before being sent to our servers.
encryption.details: Military-grade AES-256 algorithm|Unique encryption keys per user|Impossible to decrypt without your password|Encryption in transit and at rest

anonymity.title: Total Anonymity
anonymity.description: Your confessions and sensitive data remain completely anonymous.
anonymity.details: No link between confessions and identity|IP addresses not stored|Minimal metadata collected|Secure pseudonym system

infrastructure.title: Secure Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Our servers are hosted in certified data centers in Europe.
infrastructure.details: ISO 27001 data centers|24/7 monitoring|Automated encrypted backups|European geographic redundancy

authentication.title: Enhanced Authentication
authentication.description: Protect your account with multiple layers of security.
authentication.details: Two-factor authentication (2FA)|Suspicious login detection|Secure sessions with expiration|Real-time security notifications

minimal.title: Minimal Collection
minimal.description: We only collect data strictly necessary for the application to function.

transparency.title: Total Transparency
transparency.description: You know exactly what data we collect and why.

control.title: User Control
control.description: You have complete control over your data: export, deletion, modification.

noSale.title: No Sale
noSale.description: Your data is never sold, shared, or monetized.

compliance.title: Compliance & Certifications
compliance.subtitle: We meet the highest international standards

gdpr.title: European GDPR
gdpr.description: Full compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation
gdpr.details: Right to be forgotten|Data portability|Explicit consent|Designated DPO

iso.title: ISO 27001
iso.details: Risk management|Security controls|Continuous improvement|Annual external audit

soc.title: SOC 2 Type II
soc.details: Access controls|Continuous monitoring|Incident management|Public audit report

tips.subtitle: Protect yourself with these best practices

password.description: Minimum 12 characters with uppercase, lowercase, numbers and symbols

2fa.description: Secure your account with a second layer of protection

contact.description: If you have specific questions about the security of your data or want to report a security issue, contact our dedicated team directly.

finalSection.description: Join a community that places privacy at the heart of everything

header.title: Privacy Policy
header.subtitle: Your privacy is our priority. Learn in detail how we collect, use and protect your personal data.

engagement.title: Our Commitment to Your Privacy
engagement.description: At BodyCount, we consider protecting your personal data as a fundamental responsibility. This privacy policy explains in detail how we collect, use, store and protect your information.
engagement.commitment: We are committed to being transparent about our practices and giving you complete control over your personal data. Your trust is essential to our mission.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection and Processing
dataCollection.description: We only collect data necessary to provide you with a personalized and secure experience. Here is a detailed overview of the types of data we process:

utilization.accessDataWithoutReason: Access your data without valid reason

content.data: Private journal entries|Anonymous confessions (no identity link)|Personal wishlist|Uploaded media files

usage.data: Feature usage frequency|AI analysis preferences|Credit usage history|Application settings

technical.data: Browser type and version|Operating system|Screen resolution|Error logs (anonymized)

security.title: Security Measures
security.subtitle: How we protect your data
security.description: We have implemented robust security measures to protect your data against any unauthorized access, modification, disclosure or destruction.

encryption.description: All your data is encrypted with AES-256 before storage

anonymization.description: No possible link between your confessions and your identity

access.description: Only authorized employees can access systems

dataTransfers.title: Data Transfers
dataTransfers.description: Your data is stored exclusively in data centers located in the European Union, ensuring GDPR compliance.
dataTransfers.noThirdCountry: No transfer to third countries is made without appropriate safeguards and your explicit consent.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We only keep your data for the time necessary for the purposes for which it was collected.
dataRetention.accountDeletion: After deleting your account, all your data is permanently erased within 30 days.

policyChanges.title: Changes to this Policy
policyChanges.description: We may update this policy to reflect changes in our practices or for legal reasons.
policyChanges.notification: We will notify you by email of any significant changes at least 30 days before they take effect.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.cnil: You can also exercise your rights with the CNIL if you consider that we do not comply with the regulations.

header.title: Support Center
header.subtitle: We're here to help! Quickly find answers to your questions or contact our dedicated team.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quickly find answers to your questions

q1.question: What is BodyCount and how does it work?
q1.answer: BodyCount is your private digital diary with AI analysis. Create journal entries, manage your relationships, share anonymous confessions and receive personalized insights on your evolution. The application uses AI to analyze your behavioral patterns and help you in your personal development.

q2.question: How to use AI for my insights?
q2.answer: BodyCount's AI analyzes your journal entries, relationships and confessions to generate personalized insights. Go to the 'Analysis' section of your dashboard, select the desired type of analysis (emotional, relational, behavioral) and click 'Generate insight'. Each analysis costs 10 credits.

q3.question: Is my data really secure?
q3.answer: Absolutely. We use end-to-end AES-256 encryption, your confessions are completely anonymous, and no data is sold to third parties. Our servers are hosted in Europe and GDPR compliant. You can enable two-factor authentication for even more security.

q4.question: Can I use BodyCount for free?
q4.answer: Yes! You receive 30 free credits upon registration plus 1 daily bonus credit. Basic features (journal, relationships, confessions) are free. Only AI analyses cost 10 credits each.

q1.question: What to do if I forgot my password?
q1.answer: Click 'Forgot password' on the login page or go to Settings > Account > Change password. You can also reset your password directly from security settings. Check your spam if you don't receive the email.

q2.question: How to delete my account?
q2.answer: Go to Settings > Account > Sensitive area > Delete my account permanently. You will need to type 'DELETE' in capital letters to confirm. All your data will be permanently erased. This action is irreversible.

q3.question: How to enable two-factor authentication?
q3.answer: In Settings > Account > Advanced security > Two-factor authentication, click 'Enable'. Scan the QR code with Google Authenticator, enter the verification code and save your recovery codes. This is highly recommended for security.

q4.question: How to change my age or information?
q4.answer: Go to Settings > Profile. You can modify your age (must be between 18 and 99 years) and your preferences. Email cannot be modified for security reasons.

q1.question: How to buy credits?
q1.answer: Click on your credit balance in the header or go to Settings > Account > Buy credits. You will be redirected to the purchase page with several available packs: Beginner Pack (100 credits), Standard Pack (500 credits), Premium Pack (1000 credits).

q2.question: Why are some features paid?
q2.answer: AI analyses require significant computing resources and advanced AI models. That's why they cost 10 credits. All other features (journal, relationships, confessions, navigation) remain completely free. You receive 1 free credit per day.

q3.question: How do credits work?
q3.answer: 1 credit = 1 AI analysis costs 10 credits. You receive 30 free credits upon registration + 1 credit/day. Purchased credits are valid for 12 months, free ones don't expire. You can see your balance at the top right of the interface.

q4.question: Can I get a refund?
q4.answer: Yes, full refund within 14 days if credits have not been used. Consumed credits are non-refundable. Contact support@bodycount.app with your order number for any request.

q1.question: How to export my data?
q1.answer: Go to Settings > Data > Data export > Download my data (JSON). The file contains your profile, relationships, confessions and settings. Export is free and available 24/7. You can also request a ZIP export.

q2.question: The application is not working properly, what to do?
q2.answer: 1) Clear your browser cache, 2) Log out and log back in, 3) Check your internet connection, 4) Try in private browsing. If the problem persists, contact support@bodycount.app with error details and your browser.

q3.question: Can I use BodyCount on mobile?
q3.answer: Yes! BodyCount is fully responsive and works perfectly on mobile via your browser. Add the site to your home screen for an app-like experience. Native iOS and Android applications are planned for 2025.

q4.question: How to sync my data between devices?
q4.answer: Your data is automatically synchronized via your account. Simply log in with the same email/password on any device. All your entries, relationships and settings will be available instantly.
